Cherrycake\Modules\Locale::getTimeZoneName

    Signature

    public function getTimeZoneName([boolean $timezone = false] )

    Parameters

    $timezone — boolean
    The timezone id to obtain the name of. If not specified, the current locale timezone is used

    Returns

    string
    The timezone name in the TZ standard
